Interface IDataDAO<DataType>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IPatientDAO, IUserDAO
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericHybernateDAO, JDBCDAO, PatientHybernateDAO, PatientJDBCDAO, UserHybernateDAO, UserJDBCDAO

    public interface IDataDAO<DataType>

    • Method Detail

      • create

        void create(DataType data)
     throws DaoSaveObjectException
        Add a new element to the DAO
        Parameters:
        data - the new element
        Throws:
        DaoSaveObjectException - thrown when there are problems with saving the new element

      • readAll

        java.util.List<DataType> readAll()
                          throws DaoLoadObjectException
        Retrieve all elements in the DAO
        Returns:
        A list containing all elements
        Throws:
        DaoLoadObjectException - thrown when there are problems with reading the elements

      • search

        java.util.List<DataType> search(DataType data,
                                IMatcher<DataType> matcher)
                         throws DaoLoadObjectException
        Parameters:
        Data - search for a specific field of data in the DAO
        Matcher - defines which search method should be used
        Returns:
        A list of found elements
        Throws:
        DaoLoadObjectException - thrown when there are problems with reading the elements

      • update

        void update(DataType data)
     throws DaoSaveObjectException
        Update a specific element in the DAO
        Parameters:
        data - Element to be updated
        Throws:
        DaoSaveObjectException - thrown when there are problems with saving the objects

      • delete

        void delete(DataType data)
     throws DaoSaveObjectException
        Delete a specific element in the DAO
        Parameters:
        data - element to be deleted
        Throws:
        DaoSaveObjectException - thrown when there are problems with deleting the objects
